articles.title: 'Agar nahi aana to bhaad mein jaaye': Javed Miandad brutally attacks BCCI over India's Asia Cup stance - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former Pakistan skipper Javed Miandad has launched a scathing attack on the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) over India's Asia Cup stance. Miandad wants the International Cricket Council (ICC) to take strict action against the BCCI. | Cricket
articles.content: Former Pakistani cricketer Javed Miandad has launched a scathing attack on the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) over their stance against touring Pakistan for the 2023 edition of the Asia… [+2092 chars]

articles.author: fin24
articles.title: India's Adani denies his rise was due to Modi, amid report on 'largest con in corporate history' - News24
articles.description: Beleaguered Indian tycoon Gautam Adani denied Friday that his rise to become Asia's richest man - a title he has lost in a phenomenal stock rout - was due to Prime Minister Narendra Modi, as shares in his conglomerate fell again.

articles.author: Bobby McGill
articles.title: 'Pollution Pencils' - Otrivin and Wunderman Thompson Transform Toxic Air into Pencils - Branding in Asia Magazine
articles.description: The initiative is driven by the fact that 98% of children in India breathe toxic air, according to research by the World Health Organisation (WHO), not only outdoors, but also in their classrooms - where children spend up to 8 hours a day, the campaign said.

articles.title: Should you replace white rice with konjac rice if you're trying to lose weight? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: South Korean actress Song Hye-kyo purportedly ate nothing but konjac rice for two months to prepare for her role in The Glory.
